update t_user_activity set activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=TIME}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_device_id = #{userDeviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=CHAR} where u_a_id = #{uAId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ua.update_time as updateTime, a.com_type_name as comTypeName from t_user_activity ua left join t_activity a on ua.activity_id = a.activity_id where ua.user_id = #{userId} and ua.`status` = 30
